text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump When blaring truck horns intruded on President Donald Trump's Friday speech in the White House Rose Garden about the search for a coronavirus vaccine, Trump claimed that this was the sound of a pro-Trump protest. (From CNN) OMG 😳 how much can one guy lie!
